import { TableContainer, Table, TableHead, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell, TextField, Paper, } from '@mui/material' import EditDeleteButton from "../molecules/editDeleteButton" import ChoosePayedByButton from "../molecules/choosePayedByButton" import CreditCardIcon from '@mui/icons-material/CreditCard' import MonetizationOnIcon from '@mui/icons-material/MonetizationOn' import ValueEditTextFieldCost from "../molecules/valueEditTextFieldCost" import ValueEditTextFieldName from "../molecules/valueEditTextFieldCost copy" import ValueEditTextFieldCategory from "../molecules/valueEditTextFieldCategory" import ValueEditTextFieldDate from "../molecules/valueEditTextFieldDate" function CrudUnit(props: any) { const payment = props.payment const columnNames = props.columnNames return( <> {columnNames.map((columnName)=>( {columnName} ))} {payments.map((payment) => ( ))}
{props.payment.onEdit ? : {payment.cost+" 円"} {payment.name} {payment.category} {payment.payedBy === 'credit' ? : } {payment.date} } ) } export default CrudUnit
